title: Bitcoin Stuck in a Rut After Warsh Pick as ETFs Shed Billions
description: Bitcoin traded near two-month lows after Donald Trump named Kevin Warsh as the next Federal Reserve chair — a choice that did little to lift sentiment in a market already under pressure from persistent ETF outflows.
content: Bitcoin traded near two-month lows after Donald Trump named Kevin Warsh as the next Federal Reserve chair — a choice that did little to lift sentiment in a market already under pressure from persistent ETF outflows.
